EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_SupersonicAppDev_WP_Q418.Download Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading our white paper!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Supersonic Application Development & Delivery with Spring Boot and Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/supersonic-application-development-and-delivery-with-spring-boot-and-pivotal-cloud-foundry]]> white paper. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you investigate technology options for your cloud-native journey.
Given your interest in this white paper, we thought you might also find these resources of use <[[https://content.pivotal.io/thank-you-for-downloading-supersonic-application-development-and-delivery-with-spring-boot-and-pivotal-cloud-foundry]]>.
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its cloud-native journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team
